Rewrite the sentence in the Simple Past tense: "I am currently reading a fascinating book."
respostas_erradas: I was currently reading a fascinating book.
I read a fascinating book currently.
I have read a fascinating book currently.

I read a fascinating book currently.
I have read a fascinating book currently.
